items.sentence: Tom was much taller than me when we were in elementary school.
Tom was on the other side of town at the time of the shooting.
Tom is the only person who could have stolen Mary\'s necklace.
We can\'t really do anything until we get permission from Tom.
Tom doesn\'t have to impress me. He needs to impress the boss.
Tom doesn\'t know the difference between a stream and a river.
Tom thought Mary should go over to John\'s house and help him.
I hope Tom can stay with us for a couple of weeks next summer.
I just wish I could figure out what to give Tom for Christmas.
I called and asked Tom if he knew when Mary would be arriving.
